name: Patryk Zaslawski
profile_summary: As a dynamic Project Manager with a strong technical aptitude, I bring over 8 years of expertise in managing large-scale projects, particularly in the e-commerce, financial, and healthcare sectors. My proficiency in **data-driven insights**, **change management**, and **clinical trial management** enables me to guide teams effectively while ensuring project alignment with business objectives. I excel in fostering collaboration through exceptional **interpersonal skills** and **communication skills**, driving project success with strong **leadership** and **adaptability**. My background as a Senior Python Full Stack Developer has equipped me with problem-solving capabilities, complemented by a solid understanding of technical frameworks including **Python (FastAPI, Django, Flask)**, **Angular**, **Vue**, **React**, **Next.js**, and cloud services like **AWS** and **Azure**. I leverage these skills to implement innovative solutions that not only meet project criteria but also enhance operational efficiency.
